body_html: Caffe2 only has packages in conda at the moment. 'conda install -c caffe2 caffe2' will install the Caffe2 libraries into an Anaconda env; they will be linked against other libraries in the Anaconda env as well.
body_text: Caffe2 only has packages in conda at the moment. 'conda install -c caffe2 caffe2' will install the Caffe2 libraries into an Anaconda env; they will be linked against other libraries in the Anaconda env as well.
body: Caffe2 only has packages in conda at the moment. 'conda install -c caffe2 caffe2' will install the Caffe2 libraries into an Anaconda env; they will be linked against other libraries in the Anaconda env as well.
